quote: Years of togetherness teach the partners true emotional intimacy: trust and share feelings and thoughts; but often still drive them away from each other, if one partner only is willing to learn.
quote_letters: YEARS OF TOGETHERNESS TEACH THE PARTNERS TRUE EMOTIONAL INTIMACY TRUST AND SHARE FEELINGS AND THOUGHTS BUT OFTEN STILL DRIVE THEM AWAY FROM EACH OTHER IF ONE PARTNER ONLY IS WILLING TO LEARN
